title: State v. Ronnie Long – Episode 2 – Judge, Jury, and Executioner
description: March 19, 2018 / In Episode 2 of this series on the Ronnie Long case, the team examines the evidence collected against Ronnie Long and the odd sentencing and jury selection schemes in place in North Carolina in 1976.
